analyzed: namaḥ śrī lokanāthāya
apohaḥ śabda arthaḥ nirucyate
nanu kaḥ yam apohaḥ nāma
kim idam anyasmāt apohyate
asmāt vai anyat apohyate

original: asmin vānyadapohyata iti vyutpattyā vijātivyāvṛttaṃ vāhya meva vivakṣitaṃ;
analyzed: asmin vā anyat apohyate iti vyutpattyā vijāti vyāvṛttam vāhyam meva vivakṣitam
buddhi ākāraḥ vā

original: yadi vā apohanaṃ apoha ityanya vyāvṛttimātraṃ iti trayaḥ pakṣāḥ /
analyzed: yadi vā apohanam apohaḥ iti anya vyāvṛtti mātram iti trayaḥ pakṣāḥ
na tāvat ādimau pakṣau
apoha nāmnā vidheḥ eva vivakṣita tvāt
antimaḥ pi asaṅgataḥ prati ti vādhita tvāt

original: tathāhi parvvatoddeśe vanhirastīti śābdau pratītirvvidhirūpamevollikhantī lakṣyate;
analyzed: tathā hi parvvata uddeśe vanhiḥ asti iti śābdau pratītiḥ vidhi rūpam evā ullikhantī lakṣyate
na anagniḥ na bhavati iti nivṛtti mātram āmukhayantī

original: yacca pratyakṣavādhitaṃ na tatra sādhanāntarāvakāśa ityatiprasiddham /
analyzed: yat ca pratyakṣa vādhitam na tatra sādhana antara avakāśaḥ iti ati prasiddham

original: atha yadyapi nivṛttimahaṃ pratyemīti na vikalpaḥ /
analyzed: atha yadi api nivṛttim aham pratyemi iti na vikalpaḥ
tathā api nivṛtta padārtha ullekhaḥ eva nivṛtti ullekhaḥ
na hi anantar bhāvita viśeṣaṇa pratīti viśiṣṭa pratītiḥ

original: tato yathā sāmānyamahaṃ pratyemīti vikalpābhāve 'pi sādhāraṇākāraparisphuraṇāt vikalpabuddhiḥ sāmānyabuddhiḥ pareṣām;
analyzed: tatas yathā sāmānyam aham pratyemi iti vikalpa abhāve sādhāraṇa ākāra parisphuraṇāt vikalpa buddhiḥ sāmānya buddhiḥ pareṣām
tathā nivṛtta pratyayā kṣiptā nivṛtti buddhiḥ apoha pratīti vyavahāram ātanoti iti ced
nanu sādhāraṇa ākāra parisphuraṇe vidhi rūpa tayā yadi sāmānya bodha vyavasthā
tat kim āyātam asphu rat abhāva ākāre cetasi nivṛtti pratīti vyavasthāyāḥ

original: tato nivṛttimahaṃ pratyemītyevamākārābhāve 'pi nivṛttyākārasphuraṇaṃ yadi syāt,
analyzed: tatas nivṛttim aham pratyemi iti evam ākāra abhāve nivṛtti ākāra sphuraṇam yadi syāt
kaḥ nāma nivṛtti pratīti sthitim apalapet

original: anyathāsati pratibhāse tatpratītivyavahṛtiriti gavākārepi cetasi turagabodha ityastu /
analyzed: anyathā asati pratibhāse tad pratīti vyavahṛtiḥ iti gavākāre pi cetasi turaga bodhaḥ iti astu
atha viśeṣaṇa tayā antarbhūtā nivṛtti pratītiḥ iti uktam

original: tathāpi yadyagavāpoḍha itīdṛśā kārovikalpastadā viśeṣaṇatayā tadanupraveśo bhavatu,
analyzed: tathā api yadi agavāpoḍhaḥ iti īdṛśā kāraḥ vikalpaḥ tadā viśeṣaṇa tayā tad anupraveśaḥ bhavatu
kintu gauḥ iti pratītiḥ

original: tadā ca satopi nivṛttilakṣaṇasya viśeṣaṇasya tatrānutkalanāt;
analyzed: tadā ca sataḥ api nivṛtti lakṣaṇasya viśeṣaṇasya tatra an utkalanāt
katham tat pratīti vyavasthā
atha evam matiḥ
yad vidhi rūpam sphuritam tasya para apohaḥ pi asti iti tad pratītiḥ ucyate
tathā api sambandha mātram apohasya vidhiḥ eva sākṣāt nirbhāsī
api ca evam adhyakṣasya api apoha viṣaya tvam anivāryam
viśeṣataḥ vikalpāt eka vyāvṛtta ullekhinaḥ khila anya vyāvṛttam īkṣamāṇasya
tasmāt vidhi ākāra avagrahāt adhyakṣa vat vikalpasya api vidhi viṣaya tvam eva na anya apoha viṣaya tvam iti katham apohaḥ śabda arthaḥ ghuṣyate
atra abhidhīyate
na asmābhiḥ apoha śabdena vidhiḥ eva kevalaḥ bhipretaḥ
na api anya vyāvṛtti mātram
kintu anya apoha viśiṣṭaḥ vidhiḥ śabdānām arthaḥ
tatas ca na pratyeka pakṣa upanipāti doṣa avakāśaḥ

original: yattu goḥ pratītau na tadātmāparātmeti sāmarthyādapohaḥ paścānniścīyata iti vidhivādināṃ matam;
analyzed: yat tu goḥ pratītau na tad ātmā aparātmā iti sāmarthyāt apohaḥ paścāt niścīyate iti vidhi vādinām matam

original: anyāpohapratītau vā sāmarthyāt anyāpoḍhovadhāryyate iti pratiṣedhavādināṃ matam /
analyzed: anya apoha pratītau vā sāmarthyāt anya apoḍhā avadhāryyate iti pratiṣedha vādinām matam
tat asundaram
prāthamikasya api pratipatti krama adarśanāt

original: na hi vidhiṃ pratīpadya kaścidarthāpattitaḥ paścādapohamavagacchati;
analyzed: na hi vidhim pratīpadya kaścid arthāpattitaḥ paścāt apoham avagacchati
apoham vā pratipadya anya apodam
tasmāt goḥ pratipattiḥ iti anyā apoḍha pratipattiḥ ucyate
yadi api ca anya apoḍha śabda an ullekhaḥ uktaḥ
tathā api na apratipattiḥ eva
viśeṣaṇa bhūtasya anya apohasya a gavā apoḍhe eva go śabdasya niveśita tvāt

original: yathā nīlotpale niveśitādindīvaraśabdānnīlotpala pratītau tatkāla eva nīlimasphuraṇamanivāryyam;
analyzed: yathā nīlotpale niveśitāt indīvara śabdāt nīlotpala pratītau tad kāle eva nīlima sphuraṇam anivāryam

original: tathā gośabdādapyagavāpoḍhe niveśitāt gopratītau tulyakālameva viśeṣaṇatvāt ago[']pohasphuraṇamanivāryyam /
analyzed: tathā go śabdāt api a gavāpoḍhe niveśitāt go pratītau tulya kālam eva viśeṣaṇa tvāt aga upoha sphuraṇam anivāryam
yathā pratyakṣasya prasahya rūpa abhāva grahaṇam abhāva vikalpa utpādana śaktiḥ eva
tathā vidhi vikalpānām api tad anurūpa anuṣṭhāna dāna śaktiḥ eva abhāva grahaṇam abhidhīyate
paryyudāsa rūpa abhāva grahaṇam tu niyata sva rūpa sambedanam ubhayoḥ aviśiṣṭam

original: anyathā yadi śabdādarthapratipattikāle kalito na parāpohaḥ;
analyzed: anyathā yadi śabdāt artha pratipatti kāle kalitaḥ na para apohaḥ
katham anya parihāreṇa pravṛttiḥ
tatas gām vadhāna iti śva ādīn api vadhnīyāt
yat api avocat vācaspatiḥ
jātimatyaḥ vyaktavyaḥ
vikalpānām śabdānām ca gocaraḥ

original: tāsāñca tadvatīnāṃ rūpamatajjātīyaparāvṛttamityarthatastadavagaterna gāmbadhāneti co dito 'śvādīn badhnāti /
analyzed: tāsām ca tadvatīnām rūpam a tad jātīya parāvṛttam iti arthataḥ tad avagateḥ na śva ādīn badhnāti

original: tadapyanenaiva nirastaṃ yato jāteradhikāyāḥ prakṣepe 'pi vyaktīnāṃ rūpamatajjātīyavyāvṛttameva cet,
analyzed: tat api anena eva nirastam yatas jāteḥ adhikāyāḥ prakṣepe vyaktīnām rūpam a tad jātīya vyāvṛttam eva ced
tadā tena eva rūpeṇa śabda vikalpayoḥ viṣayībhavantīnām katham a tad yāvṛtti parihāraḥ
atha na vijātīya vyāvṛttam vyakti rūpam
tathā a pratītam

original: vā tadā jātiprasāda eṣa iti kathamarthatopi tadavagatirityuktaprāyam /
analyzed: vā tadā jāti prasādaḥ eṣaḥ iti katham arthatā upi tad avagatiḥ iti ukta prāyam
atha jāti valāt eva anyatas vyāvṛttam
bhavatu jāti valāt sva hetu paramparā valāt vā anya vyāvṛttam
ubhayathā api vyāvṛtta pratipattau vyāvṛtti pratipattiḥ asti eva
na ca aga upoḍhe go śabda saṅketa vidhau anyonya āśraya doṣaḥ
sāmānye tadvati vā saṅkete tad doṣa avakāśāt

original: na hi sāmānyaṃ nāma sāmānyamātramabhipretam turagepi gośabdasaṅketaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: na hi sāmānyam nāma sāmānya mātram abhipretam turaga ipi go śabda saṅketa prasaṅgāt
kintu go tvam
tāvatā ca saḥ eva doṣaḥ
gavā aparijñāne go tva sāmānya aparijñānāt
go tva sāmānya aparijñane go śabda vācya aparijñānāt

original: tasmāt ekapiṇḍadarśanapūrvvako yaḥ sarvvavyaktisādhāraṇa iva bahiradhya sto vikalpabudhyākāraḥ,
analyzed: tasmāt eka piṇḍa darśana pūrvvakaḥ yaḥ sarvva vyakti sādhāraṇaḥ iva bahis adhya staḥ vikalpa budhi ākāraḥ
tatra ayam gauḥ iti saṅketa karaṇe na itaretarāśraya doṣaḥ
abhimate ca go śabda pravṛttau a go śabdena śeṣasya api abhidhāna mucitam
na ca anya apoḍhā nya apohayoḥ virodhaḥ viśeṣya viśeṣaṇa kṣatiḥ vā
paraspara vyavaccheda abhāvāt
sāmānādhikaraṇya sadbhāvāt
bhū tala ghaṭa abhāva vat
sva abhāvena hi virodhaḥ na para abhāvena iti ā bāla prasiddham

original: eṣa panthāḥ śrughnamupatiṣṭhata ityatrāpyapoho gamyata eva;
analyzed: eṣa panthāḥ śrughnam upatiṣṭhate iti atra api apohaḥ gamyate eva
aprakṛta patha antara apekṣayā eṣaḥ eva
śrughna pratyanīka aniṣṭa sthāna apekṣayā śrughnam eva
araṇya mārga vat viccheda abhāvāt upatiṣṭhate eva

original: sārthadūtādivyavacchedena panthāeveti pratipadaṃ vyavacchedasya sulabhatvāt tasmādapohadharmmaṇo vidhirūpasya śabdādavagatiḥ;
analyzed: sārtha dūta ādi vyavacchedena panthāḥ eva iti pratipadam vyavacchedasya sulabha tvāt tasmāt apoha dharmmaṇaḥ vidhi rūpasya śabdāt avagatiḥ
puṇḍarīka śabdāt iva śvetima viśiṣṭasya padmasya
yadi evam vidhiḥ eva śabda arthaḥ vaktum ucitaḥ
katham apohaḥ gīyate iti ced
uktam atra apoha śabdena anya apoha viśiṣṭaḥ vidhiḥ ucyate
tatra vidhau pratīyamāne viśeṣaṇa tayā tulya kālam anya apoha pratītiḥ iti
na ca evam pratyakṣasya api apoha viṣaya tva vyavasthā karttum ucitā
tasya śābda pratyayasya iva vastu viṣaya tve vivāda abhāvāt
vidhi śabdena ca parāvṛttaḥ
yathāpratibhāsam buḍdhi ākāraḥ ca
tatra śabda vācyaḥ vyavasthāpyate
na sva lakṣaṇa parisphūrttyā pratyakṣa vat deśa kāla avasthā niyata pravyakta sva lakṣaṇa asphuraṇāt
yat śāstram
śabdena avyāpṛta ākhyasya buddhvau apratibhāsanāt
arthasya dṛṣṭau iva iti

original: indriyaśabdasvabhāvopāyabhedāt ekasyaiva pratibhāsa bheda iti cet?
analyzed: indriya śabda svabhāva upāya bhedāt ekasya eva pratibhāsa bhedaḥ iti ced
atra api uktam
jātaḥ nāma āśrayaḥ nyā anyaḥ cetasā antasya vastunaḥ
ekasya eva kutas rūpam bhinna ākāra avabhāsi tat

original: na hi spaṣṭāspaṣṭe dve rūpe parasparaviruḍdhe ekasya vastunaḥ staḥ;
analyzed: na hi spaṣṭa aspaṣṭe dve rūpe paraspara viruḍdhe ekasya vastunaḥ staḥ
yatas ekena indriya buḍdhau pratibhāseta anyena vikalpe
tathā sati vastunaḥ eva bheda prāpteḥ
na hi svarūpa bhedāt aparaḥ vastu bhedaḥ
na ca pratibhāsa bhedāt apara sva rūpa bhedaḥ
anyathā trailokyam ekam eva vastu syāt

original: dūrāsannadeśavarttinoḥ puruṣayoḥ ekatra śākhini spaṣṭāspaṣṭapratibhāsabhedepi na śākhibheda iti cet?
analyzed: dūra āsanna deśa varttinoḥ puruṣayoḥ ekatra śākhini spaṣṭa aspaṣṭa pratibhāsa bhede pi na śākhi bhedaḥ iti ced
na brūmaḥ pratibhāsa bhedaḥ bhinna vastu niyataḥ
kintu eka viṣaya tva abhāva niyataḥ iti

original: tato yatrārthakriyābhedādisacivaḥ pratibhāsabhedaḥ tatra vastubhedaḥ, ghaṭavat /
analyzed: tatas yatra artha kriyā bheda ādi sacivaḥ pratibhāsa bhedaḥ tatra vastu bhedaḥ ghaṭa vat
anyatra na eka viṣaya tām pariharati iti eka pratibhāsaḥ bhrāntaḥ
etena yat āha vācaspatiḥ

original: na ca śabdapratyakṣayovvastugocaratve pratyayābhedaḥ kāraṇabhedena pārokṣyāpārokṣyabhedopapatteriti /
analyzed: na ca śabda pratyakṣayoḥ vastu gocara tve pratyaya abhedaḥ kāraṇa bhedena pārokṣya apārokṣya bheda upapatteḥ iti
tat na upayogi
parokṣa pratyayasya vastu gocara tva a samarthanāt
parokṣa tā āśrayaḥ tu kāraṇa bhedaḥ indriya gocara grahaṇa viraheṇa eva kṛtārthaḥ

original: tanna śābde pratyaye svalakṣaṇam parisphurati kiñca svalakṣaṇātmani vastuni vācye sarvvātmanā pratipatteḥ,
analyzed: tat na śābde pratyaye sva lakṣaṇam parisphurati kiñca sva lakṣaṇa ātmani vastuni vācye sarvva ātmanā pratipatteḥ
vidhi niṣedhayoḥ ayogaḥ
tasya hi vyartha
na asti iti asamartham
asadbhāve na asti iti vyartham asti iti asamartham
asti ca asti ādi pada prayogaḥ

original: tasmāt śabdapratibhāsasya vāhyārthabhāvābhāvasādhāraṇyaṃ na tadviṣayatāṃ kṣamate /
analyzed: tasmāt śabda pratibhāsasya vāhya artha bhāva abhāva sādhāraṇyam na tad viṣaya tām kṣamate

original: yacca vācaspatinā jātimabdyaktivācyatāṃ svavācaiva prastu tyānanantarameva na ca śabdārthasya jāterbhāvābhāvasādhāraṇyaṃ nopapadyate;
analyzed: yat ca vācaspatinā jāti mabdi akti vācyatām sva vācā eva prastu tyā ananantaram eva na ca śabda arthasya jāteḥ bhāva abhāva sādhāraṇyam nā upapadyate

original: sā hi svarūpato nityāpi deśakālaviprakīrṇānekavyaktyāśrayatayā bhāvābhāvasādhāraṇībhavannastinā stisambandhayogyā;
analyzed: sā hi svarūpataḥ nityā api deśa kāla viprakīrṇa aneka vyakti āśraya tayā bhāva abhāva sādhāraṇībhavan astinā sti sambandha yogyā
varttamāna vyakti sambandhi tā hi jāteḥ astitā
atīta anāgata vyakti sambandhi tā ca nāstitā iti sandigdha vyatireki tvāt anaikāntikam bhāva abhāva sādhāraṇyam anyathā siḍvam vā iti vilapitam
tāvat na prakṛta kṣatiḥ

original: jātau bharaṃ nyasyatā svalakṣaṇāvācyatvasya svayaṃ svīkārāt /
analyzed: jātau bharam nyasyatā sva lakṣaṇa a vācya tvasya svayam svīkārāt
kiñca sarvvatra padārthasya sva lakṣaṇa svarūpeṇa eva astitva ādikam cintyate
jāteḥ tu varttamāna ādi vyakti sambandhaḥ stitva ādikam iti tu bāla pratāraṇam
evam jātimat dhyakti vacane pi doṣaḥ
vyakteḥ ced pratīti siddhiḥ
jātiḥ adhikā pratīyatām
mā vā
na tu vyakti pratīti doṣa muktiḥ
ete na yat ucyate kaumārilaiḥ
sa bhāga tvāt eva vastunaḥ na sādhāraṇya doṣaḥ
vṛkṣa tvam hi anirdvārita bhāva abhāvam śabdāt avagamyate
tayoḥ anyatareṇa śabda antara avagatena sambadhyate iti
tat api asaṅgatam
sāmānyasya nityasya pratipattau anirdvārita bhāva abhāva tva ayogāt

original: yacceḍhaṃ na ca pratyakṣasyeva śabdānāṃ arthapratyāyanaprakāro yena taddṛṣṭa ivāstyādiśabdāpekṣā na syāt;
analyzed: yat ca īḍham na ca pratyakṣasya iva śabdānām artha pratyāyana prakāraḥ yena tad dṛṣṭe iva asti ādi śabda apekṣā na syāt
vicitra śakti tvāt pramāṇānām iti tat api aindriyaka śābda pratibhāsayoḥ eka svarūpa grāhi tve

original: bhinnāvabhāsadūṣaṇena dūṣitam vicitraśaktitvañca pramāṇānāṃ sākṣātkārādhyavasāyābhyāmapi caritārtham /
analyzed: bhinna avabhāsa dūṣaṇena dūṣitam vicitra śakti tvam ca pramāṇānām sākṣātkāra adhyavasāyābhyām api caritārtham

original: tato yadi pratyakṣārthapratipādanaṃ śābdena tadvadevāvabhāsaḥ syāt;
analyzed: tatas yadi pratyakṣa artha pratipādanam śābdena tadvat eva avabhāsaḥ syāt
abhavan ca na tad viṣaya khyāpanam kṣamate

original: nanu vṛkṣaśabdena vṛkṣatvāṃśe codite sattvādyaṃśaniścayanārthamastyādipadaprayoga iti cet?
analyzed: nanu vṛkṣa śabdena vṛkṣa tva aṃśe ca udite sattva ādi aṃśa niścayana artham asti ādi pada prayogaḥ iti ced
niraṃśa tvena pratyakṣa samadhigatasya sva lakṣaṇasya kaḥ vakāśaḥ pada antareṇa
dharmma antara vidhi niṣedhayoḥ pramāṇa antareṇa vā
pratyakṣe pi pramāṇa antara apekṣā dṛṣṭe ti ced
bhavatu tasya aniścaya ātma tvāt anabhyasta sva rūpa viṣaye

original: vikalpastu svayanniścayātmako yatra grāhī tatra kimapareṇa?
analyzed: vikalpaḥ tu svayam niścaya ātmakaḥ yatra grāhī tatra kim apareṇa

original: asti ca śabdaliṅgāntarāpekṣā tato na vastu svarūpagrahaḥ /
analyzed: asti ca śabda liṅga antara apekṣā tatas na vastu svarūpa grahaḥ

original: nanu bhinnā jātyādayo dharmmāḥ parasparaṃ dharmmiṇaśceti jātilakṣaṇaikadharmmadvāreṇa
analyzed: nanu bhinnāḥ jāti ādayaḥ dharmmāḥ parasparam dharmmiṇaḥ ca iti jāti lakṣaṇa eka dharmma dvāreṇa

original: pratītepi śākhini dharmmāntaravattayā na pratītiriti kinna bhinnā bhidhānādhī no
analyzed: pratīte api śākhini dharmma antaravat tayā na pratītiḥ iti kin na bhinnā bhidhāna adhī no
dharma antarasya nīla cala uccaistara tva ādeḥ avavodhaḥ
tat etat asaṅgatam
akhaṇḍa ātmanaḥ sva lakṣaṇasya pratyakṣe pratibhāsāt

original: dṛśyasya dharmmadharmmibhedasya pratyakṣapratikṣiptatvā danyathā sarvvaṃ sarvvatra syādityatiprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: dṛśyasya dharmma dharmmi bhedasya pratyakṣa pratikṣipta tvāt anyathā sarvvam sarvatra syāt iti atiprasaṅgaḥ
kālpanika bheda āśrayaḥ tu dharmma dharmmi vyavahāraḥ iti prasādhitam śāstre
bhavatu vā paramārthikaḥ dharmma dharmmi bhedaḥ
tathā api anayoḥ samavāya ādeḥ dūṣita tvāt upakāra lakṣaṇā eva pratyāsattiḥ eṣitavyā
evam ca yathā indriya pratyāsattyā pratyakṣeṇa dharmmi pratipattau sakala tad dvarmma pratipattiḥ

original: tathā śabdaliṅgābhyāmapi vācyavācakādi sambandhapratibaddhābhyāṃ dharmmipratipattau niravaśeṣataḍvarmmapratipatti rbhavet;
analyzed: tathā śabda liṅgābhyām api vācya vācaka ādi sambandha pratibaddhābhyām dharmmi pratipattau niravaśeṣa taḍvarmma pratipattiḥ rbhavet
pratyāsatti mātrasya aviśeṣāt
yat ca vācaspatiḥ
na ca eka upādhinā sattve viśiṣṭe tasmin gṛhīte
upādhi antara viśiṣṭa tap gdrahaḥ
svabhāvaḥ hi dravyasya upādhibhiḥ vviśiṣyate

original: natūpādhayo vā viśeṣyatvaṃ vā tasya svabhāva iti /
analyzed: na tu upādhayaḥ vā viśeṣya tvam vā tasya svabhāvaḥ iti
tat api plavate eva
na hi abhedāt upādhi antara grahaṇam camāsañji tam
bhedam puraskṛtya eva upakāraka grahaṇe upakāryya grahaṇa prasañjanāt

original: na cāgnidhūmayoḥ kāryyakāraṇabhāva iva svabhāvata eva dharmmadharmmiṇoḥ pratiniyamakalpanamucitam /
analyzed: na ca agni dhūmayoḥ kāryya kāraṇa bhāve iva svabhāvataḥ eva dharmma dharmmiṇoḥ pratiniyama kalpanam ucitam
tayoḥ api pramāṇa asiddha tvāt
pramāṇa siddhe ca svabhāva upavarṇanam iti nyāyaḥ
yat ca atra nyāya bhūṣaṇena sūryya ādi grahaṇe tad upakāryya aśeṣa vastu rāśi grahaṇa prasañjanam uktam

original: tadabhiprāyānavagāhana phalam tathā hi tvanmate dharmmadharmmiṇorbhedaḥ upakāralakṣaṇaiva ca pratyāsattiḥ /
analyzed: tad abhiprāya an avagāhana phalam tathā hi tvad mate dharmma dharmmiṇoḥ bhedaḥ upakāra lakṣaṇā eva ca pratyāsattiḥ
tadā upakāraka grahaṇe samāna deśasya eva dharmma rūpasya eva ca upakāryyasya grahaṇam āsañjitam

original: tat kathaṃ sūryyo pakāryyasya bhinnadeśasya dravyāntarasya vā dṛṣṭavyabhicārasya grahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ saṅgataḥ /
analyzed: tat katham sūryya upakāryyasya bhinna deśasya dravya antarasya vā dṛṣṭa vyabhicārasya grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ saṅgataḥ
tasmāt eka dharmma dvāreṇa api vastu svarūpa pratipattau sarvva ātma pratīteḥ
kva śabda antareṇa vidhi niṣedha avakāśaḥ

original: asti ca, tasmānna svalakṣaṇasya śabdavikalpaliṅgapratibhāsitvamiti sthitam //
analyzed: asti ca tasmāt na sva lakṣaṇasya śabda vikalpa liṅga pratibhāsi tvam iti sthitam
na api sāmānyam śābda pratyaya pratibhāsi

original: saritaḥ pāre gāvaścarantīti gavādiśabdāt sāsrāśṛṅgalāṅgūlādayo 'kṣarākāraparikaritāḥ sajātīyabhedāparāmarśanāt sampiṇḍitaprāyāḥ pratibhāsante
analyzed: saritaḥ pāre gāvaḥ caranti iti go ādi śabdāt kṣara ākāra parikaritāḥ sajātīya bheda a parāmarśanāt sampiṇḍita prāyāḥ pratibhāsante
na ca tat eva sāmānyam
varṇa ākṛti akṣara ākāra śrūni aṅga utvam hi kathyate
tat eva ca sa asrāśṛṅga ādi mātram akhila vyaktau atyanta vilakṣaṇam api sva lakṣaṇena ekīkriyamāṇam sāmānyam iti ucyate
tādṛśasya vāhyasya aprāpteḥ bhrāntiḥ eva asau keśa pratibhāsa vat
tasmāt vāsanā vaśāt duḍveḥ eva tad ātmanā vivarttaḥ uyam astu
asat eva vā tat rūpam khyātu

original: vyaktaya eva vā sajātīyabhedatiraskāreṇānyathā bhāsantā manubhavavyavadhānāt;
analyzed: vyaktayaḥ eva vā sajātīya bheda tiraskāreṇa anyathā
smṛti pramoṣaḥ
sarvvathā nirvviṣayaḥ khalu ayam sāmānya pratyayaḥ
kva sāmānya vārttā
yat punar sāmānya abhāve sāmānya pratyayasya ākasmika tvam uktam tat ayuktam
yatas pūrvva piṇḍa daṇḍa darśana smaraṇa sahakāriṇā atiricyamāna a viśeṣa pratyaya janikā sāmagrī nirvviṣayam sāmānya vikalpam utpādayati
tat evat na śābda pratyaye jātiḥ pratibhāti
nā api pratyakṣe na siddhiḥ
adṛśya tve pratibaddha liṅga adarśanāt
na api indriya vat asyāḥ siddhiḥ
jñāna kāryyataḥ kādācitkasya eva nimitta antarasya siddheḥ

original: yadāpi piṇḍāntare antarāle vā gobuddherabhāvaṃ darśayet;
analyzed: yadā api piṇḍa antare antarāle vā go buddheḥ abhāvam darśayet
tadā śāvaleya ādi sakala go piṇḍānām eva abhāvāt abhāvaḥ goḥ buddheḥ ūpapadyamānaḥ katham artha antaram ākṣipet
go tvāt eva go piṇḍaḥ
anyathā tura gopi go piṇḍaḥ syāt

original: yadyevaṃ gopiṇḍādeva gotvamanyathā turagatvamapi gotvam syāt /
analyzed: yadi evam go piṇḍāt eva go tvam anyathā turaga tvam api go tvam syāt

original: tasmāt kāraṇaparamparāta eva gopiṇḍo gotvaṃ tu bhavatu mā vā /
analyzed: tasmāt kāraṇa paramparātaḥ eva go piṇḍaḥ go tvam tu bhavatu mā vā
nanu sāmānya pratyaya janana sāmarthyam yadi ekasmāt piṇḍāt abhinnam
tadā vijātīya vyāvṛttam piṇḍa antaram asamartham

original: atha bhinnaṃ tadā tadeva sāmānyam nāmni paraṃ vivāda iti cet?
analyzed: atha bhinnam tadā tat eva sāmānyam nāmni param vivādaḥ iti ced
abhinnā eva sā śaktiḥ prati vastu

original: yathātvekaḥ śaktasvabhāvo bhāvaḥ tatha anyopi bhavan kīdṛśandoṣamāvahati?
analyzed: yathā tu ekaḥ śakta svabhāvaḥ bhāvaḥ anyaḥ api bhavan kīdṛśan doṣam āvahati

original: yathā bhavatāṃ jātirekāpi samānadhvaniprasavaheturanyāpi svarūpeṇaiva jātyantaranirapekṣā /
analyzed: yathā bhavatām jātiḥ ekā api samāna dhvani prasava hetuḥ anyā api svarūpeṇa eva jāti antara nirapekṣā

original: tathāsmākaṃ vyaktirapi jātinirapekṣā svarūpeṇaiva bhinnā hetuḥ /
analyzed: tathā asmākam vyaktiḥ api jāti nirapekṣā svarūpeṇa eva bhinnā hetuḥ
yat tu trilocanaḥ

original: aśvatvagotvā dīnāṃ sāmānya viśeṣāṇāṃ svāśraye samavāyaḥ sāmānyam;
analyzed: aśva tva go tva ādīnām sāmānya viśeṣāṇām svāśraye samavāyaḥ sāmānyam
sāmānyam iti abhidhāna pratyayayoḥ nimittam iti
yadi evam vyaktiṣu api ayam eva tathā abhidhāna pratyaya hetuḥ astu
kim sāmānya svīkāra pramādena
na ca samavāyaḥ sambhavī

original: iheti buddheḥ samavāyasiddhiriheti dhīśca dvayadarśane syāt /
analyzed: iha iti buddheḥ samavāya siddhiḥ iha iti dhīḥ ca dvaya darśane syāt
na ca kvacid tad viṣaye tu apekṣā sva kalpanā mātram atas abhyupāyaḥ

original: etena yeyaṃ pratyayānuvṛttiranuvṛttavastvanuyāyinī kathamatyantabhedinīsu vyaktiṣu vyāvṛttaviṣayapratyayabhāvānupātinīṣu bhavitumarhatītyuhāpravarttanamasya  #
analyzed: etena yā iyam pratyaya anuvṛttiḥ anuvṛtta vastu anuyāyinī katham atyanta bhedinīsu vyaktiṣu vyāvṛtta viṣaya pratyaya bhāva anupātinīṣu bhavitum arhati iti uhā pravarttanam asya
pratyākhyātam
jāṭiṣu eva paraspara vyāvṛtta tayā vyaktīyamānāsu anuvṛtta pratyayena vyabhicārāt
yat punar anena viparyyaye vādhakam uktam
abhidhāna pratyaya anuvṛttiḥ kutaścid nivṛttya kvacid eva bhavantī nimittavatī
na ca anyat nimittam ityādi
tat na samyak
anuvṛttam antareṇa api abhidhāna pratyaya anuvṛtteḥ a tad rūpa parāvṛtta svarūpa viśeṣāt avaśyam svīkārasya sādhita tvāt

original: tasmāt, tulya bhede yayā jā tiḥ pratyāsattyā prasarpati /
analyzed: tasmāt tulya bhede yayā jā tiḥ pratyāsattyā prasarpati
kvacid nā anyatra sā evā astu śabda jñāna nibandhanam
yat punar atra nyāyabhūṣaṇena uktam na hi evam bhavati

original: yayā pratyāsattyā daṇḍasūtrādikaṃ prasarpati kvacinnānyatra saiva pratyāsattiḥ puruṣasphaṭikādiṣu daṇḍisūtritvādivyavahāranibandhanamastu kiṃ  #
analyzed: yayā pratyāsattyā daṇḍa sūtra ādikam prasarpati kvacid na anyatra sā eva pratyāsattiḥ puruṣa sphaṭika ādiṣu daṇḍi sūtri tva ādi vyavahāra nibandhanam astu kim
daṇḍa sūtra ādinā iti
tat asaṅgatam
daṇḍa sūtrayoḥ hi puruṣa sphaṭika pratyāsannayoḥ dṛṣṭayoḥ daṇḍi sūtri pratyaya hetu tvam na apalapyate
svapne na dṛṣṭam

original: tadyadīdaṃ parikalpanīyam tadā varam pratyāsattireva sāmānyapratyayahetuḥ parikalpyatām,
analyzed: tat yadi idam parikalpanīyam tadā varam pratyāsattiḥ eva sāmānya pratyaya hetuḥ parikalpyatām
kim gurvyā a parikalpanayā iti abhiprāyā parijñānāt
atha idam jāti prasādhakam anumānam abhidhīyate
yad viśiṣṭa jñānam tad viśeṣaṇa grahaṇa nāntarīyakam
yathā daṇḍi jñānam
viśiṣṭa jñānam ca idam gauḥ ayam iti arthataḥ kāryya hetuḥ
viśeṣaṇa anubhava kāryyam hi dṛṣṭānte viśiṣṭa buddhiḥ sidh vā iti
atra anuyogaḥ
viśiṣṭa buddheḥ bhinna viśeṣaṇa grahaṇa nāntarīyaka tvam vā sādhyam
viśeṣaṇa mātra anubhava nāntarīyaka tvam vā
prathama pakṣe pakṣasya pratyakṣa vādhā sādhana avadhānam anavakāśayati
vastu grāhiṇaḥ u bhaya pratibhāsa abhāvāt
viśiṣṭa buddhi tvañca sāmānyam
hetuḥ a naikāntikaḥ
bhinna viśeṣaṇa grahaṇam antareṇa api darśanāt
yathā svarūpavān ghaṭaḥ
go tvam sāmānyam iti vā
dvitīya pakṣe tu siddha sādhanam

original: svarūpavān ghaṭa ityādivat gotvajātimā n piṇḍa iti parikalpitam bhedamupādāya viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvasyeṣṭatvādgovyāvṛttānubhavabhāvitvād gaurayamiti  #
analyzed: sva rūpavān ghaṭaḥ ityādi vat go tva jātimā n piṇḍaḥ iti parikalpitam bhedam upādāya viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvasya iṣṭa tvāt go vyāvṛtta anubhava bhāvi tvāt gauḥ ayam iti
vyavahārasya
tat eva na sāmānya buddhiḥ
vādhakam ca sāmānya guṇa karmma ādi upā dhi cakrasya
dṛśya anupalambhaḥ vā prasiddhaḥ
tat evam vidhiḥ eva śabda arthaḥ
sa ca vāhyaḥ ṛthaḥ budhi ākāraḥ ca vivakṣitaḥ

original: tatra na budhyākārasya tattvataḥ sambṛttyā vā vidhiniṣedhau /
analyzed: tatra na budhi ākārasya tattvataḥ sambṛttyā vā vidhi niṣedhau
sva sambedana pratyakṣa gamya tvāt
anadhyavasāyāt ca

original: nāpi tattvato vāhyasyāpi vidhiniṣedhau tasya śābde pratyaye 'pratibhāsanāt /
analyzed: nā api tattvataḥ vāhyasya api vidhi niṣedhau tasya śābde pratyaye pratibhāsanāt

original: ataeva sarvvadharmmāṇāntattvato 'nabhilāpyatvaṃ pratibhāsādhyavasāyābhāvāt tasmāt vāhyasyaiva sāmbṛtau vidhiniṣedhau /
analyzed: atas eva sarvva dharmmāṇām tattvataḥ na abhilāpya tvam pratibhāsa adhyavasāya abhāvāt tasmāt vāhyasya eva sāmbṛtau vidhi niṣedhau
anyathā samvyavahāra hāni prasaṅgāt tat evam
na ākārasya na vāhyasya tattvataḥ vidhi sādhanam

original: vahireva hi saṃvṛttyā saṃvṛtyāpi tu nākṛteḥ //
analyzed: vahis eva hi saṃvṛttyā saṃvṛtya api tu na ākṛteḥ
etena yaṭ varmmā uttaraḥ
āropitasya vāhya tvasya vidhi niṣedhau iti alaukikam anāgamam atārkikī iyam kathayati
tat apahastitam

original: nanvadhyavasāye yadyadhyavaseyaṃ vastu na sphurati tadā tadadhyavasitamiti ko 'rthaḥ?
analyzed: nanu adhyavasāye yadi adhyavaseyam vastu na sphurati tadā tat adhyavasitam iti kaḥ rthaḥ
apratibhāse pi pravṛtti viṣayīkṛtam iti yaḥ rthaḥ
apratibhāsa aviśeṣe viṣaya antara parihāreṇa katham niyata viṣayā pravṛttiḥ iti ced

original: ucyate; yadyapi viśvamagṛhītaṃ tathāpi vikalpasya niyatasāmagrīprasūtatvena niyatākāratayā niyataśaktitvāt niyatā eva jalādau pravṛttiḥ /
analyzed: ucyate yadi api viśvam agṛhītam tathā api vikalpasya niyata sāmagrī prasūta tvena niyata ākāra tayā niyata śakti tvāt niyatā eva jala ādau pravṛttiḥ
dhūmasya parokṣa agni jñāna janana vat
niyata viṣayāḥ hi bhāvāḥ pramāṇa pariniṣṭhita svabhāvāḥ na śakti sāṅkaryya paryyanuyoga bhājaḥ
tasmāt tad adhyavasāyi tvam ākāra viśeṣa yogāt tad pravṛtti janaka tvam
na ca sādṛśyāt āropeṇa pravṛttim brūmaḥ

original: yenākāre vāhyasya vāhye vā ākārasyāropadvāreṇa dūṣaṇāvakāśaḥ /
analyzed: yena ākāre vāhyasya vāhye vā ākārasya āropa dvāreṇa dūṣaṇa avakāśaḥ

original: kintarhi svavāsanāvipākavaśādupajāyamānaiva buḍvirapaśyantyapi vāhyaṃ vāhye vṛttimātano tīti viplutaiva /
analyzed: kintarhi sva vāsanā vipāka vaśāt upajāyamānā eva buḍviḥ apaśyantī api vāhyam vāhye vṛttim ātano ti iti viplutā eva
tat evam anya abhāva viśiṣṭaḥ vijāti vyāvṛtta ūrthaḥ vidhiḥ

original: sa eva cāpohaśabdavācyaḥ śabdānāmarthaḥ pravṛttinivṛttiviṣayaśceti sthitam //
analyzed: saḥ eva ca apoha śabda vācyaḥ śabdānām arthaḥ pravṛtti nivṛtti viṣayaḥ ca iti sthitam
atra prayogaḥ
yad vācakam tat sarvvam adhyavasita a tad rūpa parāvṛtta vastu mātra gocaram
yathā iha kūpe jalam iti vacanam
vācakam ca idam gavādi śabda rūpam iti svabhāva hetuḥ
na ayam asiḍvaḥ
pūrva uktena nyāyena pāramārthika vācya vācaka bhāvasya abhāve pi
adhyavasāya kṛtasya sarvva vyavahāribhiḥ avaśya svīkarttavya tvāt
anyathā sarvva vyavahāra uccheda prasaṅgāt
na api viruddhaḥ sapakṣe bhāvāt
na ca anaikāntikaḥ
tathā hi śabdānām adhyavasita vijāti vyāvṛtta va stu mātra viṣaya tvam an icchadbhiḥ paraiḥ
vācyam sva lakṣaṇam upādhiḥ upādhi yogaḥ
sa upādhiḥ astu yadi vā kṛtiḥ astu buddheḥ
gati antara abhāvāt
aviṣaya tve ca vācaka tva ayogāt tatra
ādi antayoḥ n samayaḥ phala śakti hāneḥ madhye pi upādhi virahāt titayena yuktaḥ
tat evam vācya antarasya abhāvāt

original: viṣayavattvalakṣaṇasya vyāpakasya nivṛttau vipakṣato nivarttamānam vācakatvamadhyavasitavāhyaviṣayatvena vyāpyata iti vyāptisiddhiḥ /
analyzed: viṣayavat tva lakṣaṇasya vyāpakasya nivṛttau vipakṣataḥ nivarttamānam vācaka tvam adhyavasita vāhya viṣaya tvena vyāpyate iti vyāpti siddhiḥ
śabdaiḥ tāvat mukhyam ākhyāyate rthaḥ tatra apohaḥ tad guṇa tvena gamyaḥ

original: arthaścaiko 'dhyāsato bhāsato 'nyaḥ sthāpyo vācyastattvato naiva kaścit //
analyzed: arthaḥ ca ekaḥ dhyāsataḥ bhāsataḥ sthāpyaḥ vācyaḥ tattvataḥ nā eva kaścid
apohasiddhiḥ samāptā
kṛtiḥ iyam mahā paṇḍita ratnakīrtti pādānām
bhavatu apohe kṛtinām prapañcaḥ vastu svarūpa āsphuraṇan tu marmma

original: tatrādṛḍhe sarvvamayatnaśīrṇaṃ dṛḍhe tu sausthyannanu tāvataiva //
analyzed: tatra adṛḍhe sarvvam ayatna śīrṇam dṛḍhe tu tāvatā eva
sampūrṇa rātri prahara dvayena kīrtteḥ apohaḥ likhitaḥ sukhena
trailokya dattena parātma hetoḥ yatnāt atas yam parirakṣaṇīyaḥ
